ticket.title: FAC CLI role launch contract with hash-binding admission checks

tickets.reason: RoleSpec production binding is prerequisite for launch command admission checks.
Adapter bridge substrate is required for authoritative launch path actuation.

in_scope: Add FAC CLI role-launch command contract requiring explicit hash-bound inputs.
Implement launch-time fail-closed checks for role/context/policy/work bindings.
Emit launch receipts with role/context/policy hash commitments.
Add tests for missing/stale/unverifiable launch binding denial.
out_of_scope: Markov-blanket channel enforcement and no-bypass actuation checks.
Liveness pulse and restart policy surfaces.

steps: Define launch command flags and validation contract.
Implement admission-check pipeline prior to actuation.
Emit and validate launch receipt shape and required hash bindings.
Add negative-path tests for ambiguous launch context.

criteria: Launch command requires explicit hash-bound authority/context/policy fields.
Missing/stale/ambiguous binding state denies launch deterministically.
Launch receipts provide replay-verifiable hash lineage.

notes.security: Launch admission checks are authority-critical and must fail closed.
notes.verification: Include adversarial tests for malformed and stale launch bindings.
notes.general: This ticket establishes the launch admission contract consumed by channel and liveness work.
